book.synopsis: After a fairytale whirlwind courtship with Owen Sutherland ends in marriage, a union that will hopefully put an end to the bitter rivalry between their families, Angie Townsend finds her idyllic honeymoon shattered by a mysterious caller who informs her that her marriage is nothing more than a clever corporate raid devised by her new husband, and she vows to discover the truth. Reprint.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.5 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
